verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, apostate \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* take \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* begin \w a|strong="H4480"\w* web, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* \w add|strong="H5595"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H6547"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3381"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, hoping \w for|strong="H4714"\w* help \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* Pharao, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* trusting \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* \w of|strong="H4581"\w* Pharao \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* confusion, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* confidence \w of|strong="H4581"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w of|strong="H4581"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* Tanis, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* thy \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Hanes|strong="H2609"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1571"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* confounded \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1571"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* confusion \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* whence come \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lion|strong="H3918"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w viper|strong="H0660"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* flying basilisk, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bunches \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H2428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* no purpose: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* concerning \w this|strong="H2063"\w*: \w It|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* pride only, sit still.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* box, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* note \w it|strong="H5921"\w* diligently \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w latter|strong="H0314"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5707"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* provoketh \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* lying \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w seers|strong="H2374"\w*: \w See|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* right: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w us|strong="H7200"\w* pleasant \w things|strong="H0834"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* errors \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w path|strong="H0734"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* tumult, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w leaned|strong="H8172"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* falleth, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* found wanting \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w high|strong="H7682"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w for|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* looked \w for|strong="H3651"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* small, \w as|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w potterâ€™s|strong="H3335"\w* \w vessel|strong="H2789"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* all \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* mighty \w breaking|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w sherd|strong="H2789"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* thereof, wherein \w a|strong="H4672"\w* little \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* carried \w from|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w hearth|strong="H3344"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w*, little \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* drawn \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* pit.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* return \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*: \w in|strong="H3478"\w* silence \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* hope \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*. \w And|strong="H5127"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* mount \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* ones: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w A|strong="H0518"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* fear \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* fear \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H0259"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mast|strong="H8650"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* ship \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* ensign \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* waiteth \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* sparing \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Sion \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* thee: \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w cry|strong="H2201"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w soon|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* shell \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* spare \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* short \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w teacher|strong="H3384"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* flee \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w teacher|strong="H3384"\w*.

Thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w it|strong="H2930"\w*: \w Get|strong="H3318"\w* thee hence.
